text: Rumors have been swirling since this past May that Iggy Azalea has been dating football star Odell Beckham Jr., but it looks like she's finally setting the record straight. In a new Instagram post, the Australian native confirms that she was never dating the New York Giants player, and that people need to ` ` stop trying to make me and Odell a thing.'' In a lengthy Instagram post, Iggy writes her thoughts on the swirling rumors, stating that they've taken a toll on her ` ` real, private life'' and has her even losing sleep. ` ` Stop trying to make me and Odell a thing,'' she writes. ` ` We weren't dating back in May and we're not dating now! I try my best
